verbose_text: As Legionella does not induce caspase-1 activation in human monocytes, Amer et al. also assessed whether ASC was involved in restricting Legionella replication independent of its role on caspase-1 and found that depletion of ASC by siRNA promoted activation of NF-kappaB and enhanced bacterial growth in human monocytes.
evidence: ASC by siRNA promoted activation of NF-kappaB
